attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the sole reliance the UK has on the Grangemouth Refinery, and the national economic carnage and paralysis being caused by the current employer/union mess there, the undersigned ask that the government bring forward a Bill to nationalise the Grangemouth Refinery, and to ensure that any employee of that establishment has the same strike responsibilities as the Police and other employees of unique importance to the national interest.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
